page.title: 20 A Day In My Life (cont.)
page.content:
At 2.30 we have playtime until 2.50. I played rounders this time. Our teacher read a story until the end of at 3.30. I watched Children's ITV from 4.00. Today I saw "The Wind in the Willows". At 5.00 I had my tea, and watched "Connections" on ITV at 5.15. At 6.00 I played with my toy cars, then at 7.00 I watched "Arthur C. Clarke's World of Strange Powers". I watched "Magnum" at 8.00 and when it finished at 9.00 I went to bed.
Schools involved were Andrew Marvell Senior High,Longhll Primary,Saltshouse Junior,Thanet Junior and Wansbeck Primary. Children involved include E. Barrow(11),R. Cawkwell(15),G. Conman (15),R. Gamble(11),S. Rodriguez(8) and S. Wilson(15). Two teachers involved were Mr G.E.Dobbs & Mrs J.M.Smith.
